name: Mr Squarepants
description:
Simple yet addictive.

This game will challenge your reflexes.

Help Mr Squarepants to dodge obstacles on his way by tapping on the screen and let him pass through the gaps.

Use power-ups to gain extra advantage.

Power-up details:

Score Booster: This power-up doubles up your score increment.

Slow Potion: This power-up will slow down the spawning rate.

Gem Booster: This power-up will help you gain gems much faster.


HOW TO PLAY:

Tap on the screen to move obstacles and let Mr Squarepants to pass through the gaps between the obstacles.

FEATURES:

Simple controls.
Challenge your reflexes.
Beautiful backgrounds.
Interesting game-play.
9 different achievements to unlock.
Compete with other players around the globe.
Use Power-ups to make the game-play more interesting. 


A sharp mind and constant focus only can lead you to the top of the Leaderboard.

Sounds interesting?

Let's examine your reflexes.

Install now and let the fun begin.

Mr Squarepants is waiting for you.
